task.title: Assigning a Subscription Plan to an Item
task.shortdesc: A Subscription Plan defines a time length for the subscription or membership item. Items belonging to an Item Class with Is Subscription enabled must have a Subscription Plan assigned.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Subscription Item record and click the Manage Subscription Plans button on the Subscription Plans related list.
Enable the Select and Default checkboxes associated to the Subscription Plan and click Save.
step.info: Click Default to designate the selected Subscription plan. There must be one default subscription plan enabled for each subscription item.

taskbody.result: The Subscription Plan is assigned to a subscription item.
